text: Gravity Train was a top 10 hit for a month in 99.

name: dartigen
text:
Is it terrible that I laughed?
Because I did.

name: hannah
text: it is good that beef has best practices for dealing with internet scammers. first things first: wiki. he is a thorough kind of a man.

name: nurdbot
text: Oh man, Ray is soaking up the guilt there in the last panel. Like a sponge.

name: epicurus
text: But even if he wrote the song Gravity Train (which is an awesome song title), why did he use it as the subject line in his original e-mail? That had nothing to do with the song.

name: nurdbot
text: Maybe he thinks that music is the only way to grab the attention of the youth of today?

name: dusty
text: Maybe gravity train, being a song he wrote, sums up well the thing that he needs to contact Ray about. Like the rather disappointing email I got from Jermaine Stewart.

name: closefriend
text: I think the Brian Wheat proof was an .exe that played the song. That could have been it.

name: epicurus
text: Interesting, though he still would need to prove his name was Brian Wheat, so the .exe probably DID do that (though why you need an .exe for that is strange)

name: 1000hz
text: A comment left by 1000hz was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by KilroyWasHere, wharfrat, gothfae, Mastronaut)

name: terebikun
text: I don't know why you're getting so many lames, a trojan was my first guess too.

name: boredom_man
text:
because that was the joke

you thought it was a trojan

but it was not a trojan, after all

this... is... comedy

name: fosters
text: The email was legit; why would he attach a trojan?

name: halfdirt
text: You should never be afraid of opening .exe files in your email, as long as the message looks legit.

name: clembot
text: "on a christian dare." it's the small things that are hilarious

name: heyoo
text: If you do not accept a Christian dare, you are sent to the 8th circle of hell.

name: dusty
text: I double Christian dare you to whip it out at the governor of Washington. (Christine Gregoire)

name: woodenteeth
text: Christian Dare: devil-may-care Evangelist.

text: Jesus Christ died for our sins on a Christian dare

text: The whole arc comes crashing together brilliantly

name: gormster
text:
This article contains a trivia section.

The article could be improved by integrating relevant items into the main text and removing inappropriate items.

name: phthoggos
text: at least 15 members of Acheworld are experienced Wikipedia editors

name: drskradley
text: I have yet to change my name on a Christian dare, when every other devout, deeply sensitive Christian has :(

name: theora
text: This is a right of passage.  You are not considered an adult member of the Church in good standing until you have accepted the Christian Dare.  (Ezek. 15:12)

name: stereo
text: Paul's original name was Saul.  Ezekiel still refuses to answer my phone calls in re that question.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Ezekiel pick up the phone, Lawdy-Lawd,
Got a sinner on the other end-
[Have Mercy!]

name: stuart
text: I keep waiting for citations to appear in this strip.

name: isunklower
text: I originally thought the wiki page was of Leon's own design, to give his story some credence if any enterprising suckers were to look him up. After all, if it's on wikipedia, it must be true.

name: rbisme
text: Rays senses be right on. He knew it was a hit song from the get go.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Wednesday Blogs

Onstad: The bacon will be here today - 3/14/2007

name: kickstart
text: A question, at this juncture.  Is it a Thing that Gravity is a jokey term for Gravy?  Or is that just in my family?  I guess it is pretty arrogant to think it is only a saying in my family.

name: lightupafatty
text:
I've never heard that expression. So it's probably just something your family made up.
Look at you, putting on such airs! You are so ARROGANT!!

name: lightupafatty
text:
I guess it is pretty arrogant of me to assume that just because I haven't heard that expression that it doesn't exist.
We are a couple of sorry ass dudes, kickstart.

name: nickb285
text: I always worry that this will happen to me.

text: ACCIDENT OF THE GOVERNMENT

name: tekende
text: Dang old government's always havin' accidents

name: tigerofpts
text: You name a crisper beer and I'll eat my foot.

name: epicurus
text:
Lord I'm rollin' along on that Gravty Train/
She loaded with sorrows and loaded with pain/
No more spring in these steps no more wind in these sails/
Just this heavy old train on these rusted old rails/
